original_title: ブラック・コネクション 完結編
overview: Admiring the legend, Yasuyuki defeated and absorbed the teams that ran rampant in Tokyo, mainly in Shibuya, one after the other. However, the team that had always been the strongest and had done whatever they wanted, could easily fall apart. Against the aspiring and disciplined Yasuyuki, rebels were born, and the blood of evil, which had once again dived into the darkness, began to turn even their friends red!
title: Black Connection - The End
